snippet.title: Timberborn Update 1 is here!
snippet.description:
🔭 Learn more about Timberborn Update 1 here: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1062090/view/3146325282014603123

🌳 Get the game here (and see if there's some tasty discount):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
https://www.gog.com/game/timberborn
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/timberborn

-- About Timberborn --
Humans are gone. Will your society of lumberpunk beavers do any better? Timberborn is a city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, river control, and deadly droughts.

The game is available in English, Polish, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, German, French, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, and Japanese. For a localized description, check the store pages linked above.

-- Features --
🦦 Unique beaver factions*
💦 Droughts
🧨 River control with dams and dynamite
🪓 Timber-tech machinery
🏡 Vertical settlements
⛰️ Destructible terrain
🌇 Day and night cycle
🥕 Wellbeing mechanics
🗾 Map editor
...and more!
(*) Yes, that's an otter.

-- Find us on: --
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
https://twitter.com/Timberborn/
http://discord.gg/timberborn/
https://mechanistry.com/
